name: Hǎizéiwáng Jiējī Idle
summary: Embark on an epic voyage in Hǎizéiwáng Jiējī Idle, a captivating idle RPG inspired by the classic "One Piece" universe! Recruit your favorite characters, master iconic skills, and uncover legendary secrets in this thrilling mobile adventure. Combining the excitement of horizontal action with the ease of idle gameplay, you can conquer challenging stages and amass treasure effortlessly. Get ready to claim your own pirate glory and untold riches!
